sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3190 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , #ctrbSeqn# , #ctrbDdcd# , #ctrbTycd# , #ctrbYrmn# , #ctrbAmnt# , #bfyrDeam# , #detrAmnt# , #dyyrDeam# , #dyyrOtam# , #ayyrNtam# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3190 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn# , CTRB_DDCD=#ctrbDdcd# , CTRB_TYCD=#ctrbTycd# , CTRB_YRMN=#ctrbYrmn# , CTRB_AMNT=#ctrbAmnt# , BFYR_DEAM=#bfyrDeam# , DETR_AMNT=#detrAmnt# , DYYR_DEAM=#dyyrDeam# , DYYR_OTAM=#dyyrOtam# , AYYR_NTAM=#ayyrNtam# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3190 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

DELETE FROM YETA3190 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3190 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3190 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CTRB_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3190 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
